Huawei: ip ip-prefix SYSTEM permit 10.2.65.10 32 greater-equal 32 less-equal 32
Comments: Both configurations define a prefix list with the same prefix and matching criteria.

Nokia:
policy-statement "EXPORT_to_OSPF"
    entry 10
        from
            protocol direct
            prefix-list "SYSTEM"
        to
            protocol ospf
        action accept
            type 1
Huawei:
route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF permit node 10
 if-match protocol direct
 if-match ip-prefix SYSTEM
 apply cost-type external
ospf
 filter-policy route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF export ospf
Comments: The Huawei configuration introduces 'apply cost-type external' which is not present in the Nokia configuration. Also, the 'filter-policy' command is additional in Huawei.

Huawei:
ospf
 filter-policy route-policy EXPORT_to_OSPF export ospf
